**Explanation:**  
- The only inconsistency identified is for the entry with id **Interest20240128028**.  
- The "invoice" description states it is for "Interest Receivables", but the "recorded_type" is "Depreciation".  
- All other transaction details (date, unpaid, interest receivable as receive method, amount) match, so only the category/mislabeling is inconsistent.  
- The best estimate is to correct "recorded_type" back to "Interest Receivables" as stated in the invoice.  
- No other records in the given set show internal inconsistencies (amounts, units, payment method, etc. all match invoice lines, and duplications in initial deposits and purchases are consistent by ID).
